author: remm
msg: Allow using SSLImplementationName configuration option with JSSE, since it turns out SSLContext cannot be extended except by using JCE. In practical terms, this allows using an alternate SSL engine implementation without having to change additional things in Tomcat.

author: markt
msg: gpg2 needs an additional option set to read the passphrase from stdin

author: jpountz
msg: LUCENE-6330: BS1 should not decode norms when scores are not needed.
